verses.verse: A Psalm of David <WH1732>. Judge <WH8199> <WH8798> me, O YY <WH3068>; for I have walked <WH1980> <WH8804> in mine integrity <WH8537>: I have trusted <WH982> <WH8804> also in the YY <WH3068>; therefore I shall not slide <WH4571> <WH8799>.
Examine <WH974> <WH8798> me, O YY <WH3068>, and prove <WH5254> <WH8761> me; try <WH6884> <WH8798> my reins <WH3629> and my heart <WH3820>.
For thy lovingkindness <WH2617> is before mine eyes <WH5869>: and I have walked <WH1980> <WH8694> in thy truth <WH571>.
I have not sat <WH3427> <WH8804> with vain <WH7723> persons <WH4962>, neither will I go in <WH935> <WH8799> with dissemblers <WH5956> <WH8737>.
I have hated <WH8130> <WH8804> the congregation <WH6951> of evil doers <WH7489> <WH8688>; and will not sit <WH3427> <WH8799> with the wicked <WH7563>.
I will wash <WH7364> <WH8799> mine hands <WH3709> in innocency <WH5356>: so will I compass <WH5437> <WH8779> thine altar <WH4196>, O YY <WH3068>:
That I may publish <WH8085> <WH8687> with the voice <WH6963> of thanksgiving <WH8426>, and tell <WH5608> <WH8763> of all thy wondrous works <WH6381> <WH8737>.
YY <WH3068>, I have loved <WH157> <WH8804> the habitation <WH4583> of thy house <WH1004>, and the place <WH4725> where thine honour <WH3519> dwelleth <WH4908>.
Gater <WH622> <WH8799> not my soul <WH5315> with sinners <WH2400>, nor my life <WH2416> with bloody <WH1818> men <WH582>:
In whose hands <WH3027> is mischief <WH2154>, and their right hand <WH3225> is full <WH4390> <WH8804> of bribes <WH7810>.
But as for me, I will walk <WH3212> <WH8799> in mine integrity <WH8537>: redeem <WH6299> <WH8798> me, and be merciful <WH2603> <WH8798> unto me.
My foot <WH7272> standeth <WH5975> <WH8804> in an even place <WH4334>: in the congregations <WH4721> will I bless <WH1288> <WH8762> the YY <WH3068>.
